attributes.action: knight Barry Cryer for services to British Comedy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Barry Cryer is a legend of comedy writing and has been for half a century. He has written for, amongst others, Dave Allen, Jasper Carrott, Dick Emery, Les Dawson, Frankie Howerd, The Two Ronnies and Rory Bremner. He was also instrumental in the success of Kenny Everett, who fundamentally changed British comedy at the start of the 'Eighties. Barry has even written for Bob Hope and Jack Benny. The man is a comedy writing genius whose work has put a smile on the faces of millions over the years. I humbly recommend that he be knighted forthwith.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
